queries.query_text: Looking for a student skilled in Python, data analysis, and Tableau for a sales forecasting project.
Need a student experienced in machine learning and housing price prediction using Python and scikit-learn.
Seeking a student with front-end development skills, React, and basic data analysis.
Looking for someone with NLP and chatbot project experience using Python and spaCy.
Need a student experienced in SQL, data cleaning, and dashboard building for fintech analysis.
Seeking AI and computer vision skills for image classification using Python and OpenCV.
Looking for a Business student with marketing strategy, project management, and analytical skills.
Need an Economics student skilled in financial modeling and market research.
Seeking a Social Science student familiar with survey design and data analysis using SPSS or Excel.
Looking for a Business Analytics student experienced in SQL, Excel, and Power BI dashboard creation.
Need a Psychology student with experience in behavioral studies and Python data analysis.
